steps.name: I am on he home page "http://automationpractice.com/index.php"
I see a browser title containing "Login - My Store"
I provide my details as follows: "mark", "kofi", "Curiy7n1", "12", "May", "1977", "102 drive", "london", "Texas", "00000", "United States", "07952983202"
I see a browser title containing "My account - My Store"
I click on the dresses link
I see a browser title containing "Dresses - My Store"
I decide to add a dress to the cart
The dress is added successfullly text "Product successfully added to your shopping cart"

arguments.val: Product successfully added to your shopping cart
